channel.title: SC30 on Dawg & Hen
channel.description: Recent content in SC30 on Dawg & Hen

item.title: Dec 20, NBA highlights
item.description: Kenrich Williams is a worth watching player. SGA continues amazing clutch performances. Healthy Joel Embiid is unstoppable. Stephen Curry gave a great performance on the 4th quarter after extra mid-game rest. Tyrese Haliburton, the sophomore of the King, keeps strong with the absence of Fox. Dejounte Murray gave a great performance against the Clippers.

item.title: Dec 19, NBA highlights
item.description: The Blazers beat the Grizzlies, the hottest team in the league right now. The Norm's clutch performance shone. LaVine was out but DeRozan saved the Bulls. Jaylen Nowell backed up Anthony Edwards. He showed good shot-creating skill and a spot-up 3 point jumper. Robert Covington has been great as a sixth man of the Blazers.
